CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"MX"),"MX", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"FR"),"FR", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"UK"),"UK", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"DE"),"DE", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"ES"),"ES", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"DACH"),"DACH", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"NL"),"NL", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"IT"),"IT", IF(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c,"NA CA"),"CA", "US")))))))))
CustomField.label: Xactly Segment (Region)
